item.description:
Seacoast Outdoors is currently on hold as I care for two foster children. If you have young kids and want to get outdoors with them, please join us with KIDsplorers! at

www.meetup.com/KIDSPLORERS

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Welcome to Seacoast Outdoors, unique in New England for the diversity of our outings and adventure travel, and also for our friendliness. We do local hikes, but we also do a whole lot more including all sorts of outdoor travel and adventures, from whitewater rafting in Maine to hiking or mountain biking in Utah.

Moreover, there’s a sense of camaraderie here that many say is missing from other groups. Meeting and enjoying the company of like-minded people is as important as the activity or the destination. And when you join one of our hikes, bike rides, snowshoe, skiing, kayak, or adventure travel trips, you’ll be introduced and welcomed when you arrive, treated with respect if you’re a beginner, and invited for food or a drink after we finish. We try hard to make everyone feel at home.

You'll notice that our events require small fees to participate - and here's why:
At Seacoast Outdoors, we plan creative and interesting activities in a professional manner. I research destinations, make reservations, and do everything possible to ensure our safety and enjoyment. So while many meetup groups do not charge fees, if you compare our offerings instead to adventure travel or tour guide companies, Seacoast Outdoors is quite a bargain. And I hope you’ll decide that what you get in return is worth much more.

My goal is to make this group the friendliest place on the planet to enjoy the outdoors!

Please contact me with any questions.

Kind Regards,
Lorenzo!
item.name: Seacoast Outdoors
